buttons_pack.title: Social Buttons Pack
buttons_pack.description: Extra Social Buttons for Social Locker. Includes: Instagram, Pinterest, VKontakte, Livejournal, Draugiem, Moy Mir, Odnoklassniki.

popups.title: Popups Lockers
popups.description: Adds option to display lockers inside a popup window. Provides flexible settings of conditions when popups have to be shown.

step-to-step.title: Step-by-Step
step-to-step.description: Allows to create a complex locker merging several lockers that asks a visitor to pass though all the steps to unlock hidden content.

themes_pack.title: Extended Theme Pack
themes_pack.description: Brand new themes working perfectly on mobile. Includes support for step-by-step and popup add-ons.
